column2: Unlocks a decision to start with money or event troops for the created character.
I awoke this morning with no knowledge of my past or of where I was. I was assured by confused servants who, assuming that this was some prank or test, told me that I am their ruler...
Who am I!? Where did I come from?!
Removes the decision from the list to prevent yourself from cheating or to reduce clutter.
Are you sure you want to remove the "RDU More Options" decision?
